Package Users

Class Costumer

java.lang.Object
Users.Pearson
Users.Costumer
public class Costumer extends Pearson
This class manage one of the class' 'Pearson' "son". It contains the information, the method of login and registration and all the actions that a costumer can do.
Version:
1.1.2
Author:
Danilo Basini
